This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
CodeDisplay
2964-5Specific gravity of Body fluid
2965-2Specific gravity of Urine
38875-1INR in Unspecified specimen by Coagulation assay|INR in Platelet poor plasma or blood by Coagulation assay
9322-9Cholesterol.total/Cholesterol in HDL [Percentile]
